website_summaries.verdict: New Balance introduces the 515 to add more depth to the NB Classics collection. With the 515, New Balance brings to the table a sophisticated, vintage-inspired silhouette with a low profile trimmed with contemporary elements.Functionality is a primary attribute with the shoe's superb comfort that according to testimonials is like walking on clouds. Although intended as a lifestyle sneaker, the shoe's versatility enables users to maximize their daily routines and athletic activities while maintaining an attractive style.
pros: Many reviewers have experienced utmost comfort from the New Balance 515
With its overall satisfaction from the ample cushioning and the sleek silhouette, the shoe is extremely loved by a lot of users
Some of the users have experienced supreme durability coming from the NB 515
Several buyers have commended the shoe's attractive variety of colorways, with some getting attracted to the light-hued ones like the red-toned models
Although featuring a low profile, others note that it provides ample arch support to those who experience problems with plantar fasciitis
The sneaker looks good with every outfit combination, a small number of customers have expressed
Compared to other sneakers that users have encountered, the shoe is relatively lightweight
Few reviewers are satisfied with the shoe's short break-in period, with a couple of them stating that it can be worn straight out of the box
Some like that the New Balance's 515 model has a wide toe box
This enables wearers to insert an orthopedic footbed for their preferred additional support
The low top's excellent accent combinations and strategic color placing captured the eyes of users, who were astonishingly satisfied with the brand's stylishly good looks
cons: The shoe’s narrowness have caused blisters in some users
Few users are disappointed with the misleading colors of the shoe as it didn’t the same in the pictures
Very few users have exclaimed that its very stiff sole caused them pain
A couple of buyers are slightly confused with the shoe's odd shape, with one stating that it’s like wearing two left shoes

customer_reviews.title: My new fave sneaker brand....do it!
customer_reviews.text: I have terrible feet. Got these for my all day standing job. So far so good. These are some of the most comfortable shoes I have ever worn. They felt great out of the box. Very roomy in the toe and nice arch support. I love the old-school clean lines. I will be getting another pair for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas B.

customer_reviews.title: I compared it with other brands like Asics and Adidas and New Balance's 4E is like ...
customer_reviews.text: I got 4E but it was really narrow. I compared it with other brands like Asics and Adidas and New Balance's 4E is like 2E or even narrower than other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Mike j

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: Box looks like the kicked them all the way to my house but the shoes are good love them
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoe but a little bit narrow.
customer_reviews.text: Just be careful with this, is a little bit narrow. Don't misunderstand me, size is right but the structure of the shoe makes it a little bit narrow. If your feet is wide or a little bit fatty don't go on this and try another model.
customer_reviews.author: Chonto

customer_reviews.title: the NB 515 are fairly comfortable and a pretty cool looking shoe - but if ...
customer_reviews.text: I intentionally bought the wide size - fit and comfort are critical for my satisfaction. I found that the wide was not wide enough and have some increased soreness in my feet compared to other shoes that are made a little wider. Overall, the NB 515 are fairly comfortable and a pretty cool looking shoe - but if you have a wide foot and plan to be standing and walking for quite some time than you may want to go with the double wide version.
customer_reviews.author: Big Dog

customer_reviews.title: Not what they used to be
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what happened to new balance but the quality of the shoe is not at all what it used to be. The shoe fits as it should but the insoles are garbage. The material it's made from isn't great either. I'll be looking for a different brand that makes a comfortable wide width shoe
customer_reviews.author: cyrix

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, poor fit
customer_reviews.text: Returned these. For New Balance I found the fit to be very narrow. Toe box didn’t seem wide enough either. Quality seemed good however. Ended up purchasing a pair of Adidas Cloudfoam 2s and found these to be a better fit and quite frankly a better value with more comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Great For Cold Feet
customer_reviews.text: Shoes look great, but souls are low quality foam. The first time I really wore these, I was working a 12+ hour day at a car show. It was 85 F out and I was walking on pavement and cobblestone. Throughout the day, I had to find an excuse to get in the shade because the sneakers transferred the heat through the shoe. They got so hot I had to remove them on multiple occasions. I've never had this experience with footwear before. On top of that, I ended up with a painful blister. The two stars are for the looks of the shoes, and the decent construction. Will be my last pair of new balance ever.
customer_reviews.author: Jak and Ky

customer_reviews.title: Sizing runs small
customer_reviews.text: I loved the look of the shoe but the sizing is all messed up. I wear a 10.5 wide but it was way too small. Tried an 11 too but still too small. Unfortunately had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Adam T

customer_reviews.title: NOT an SL-2 Last
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these shoes, as they were the only ones I could find that stated they were SL-2 Last in the listing. Definately not an SL-2 Last. These shoes have zero arch support, and the toe box is very narrow. Quality is sub par. The N Logo is single stitched on the smaller inset letter, which means it will snag on on everything.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Sizing on these shoes are running way small..so heads up to buyers..
customer_reviews.text: These shoes run a whole size small in leather and are really narrow..i have 5 other new balance runners and trail runners and wear a 14 regular in all of them i dont wear a wide at all ..i read the reviews before purchasing these shoes i went up to a 15 because the reviews said they run small is a understatement..they run really narrow and a whole size small in length...they are really nice looking but sizing is way off..so I'm sending my back ...
customer_reviews.author: josh

customer_reviews.title: Narrow in the ball of foot area
customer_reviews.text: I found them narrow in the ball of the foot area, as well as tight. I still wear them at least weekly, so they may still be getting broken in. Great style, and other than the issues noted, they are comfortable and breath well.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Dad with the clutch
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son because my ex wife said he needed new shoes and she didnt want to buy them. Once again, dad come in with the clutch. These shoes are great. They're super comfortable, and as advertised. They fit perfect, and he says they're the best shoes he's ever had. 5/5 would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Rabbitinred

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe for me!
customer_reviews.text: I had two pair of these around 10 and 15 years ago. This style is the closer to 2000s style. I am very pleased with these shoes. The feel is amazing. My feet really like new balance shoes. In yeas prior new balance has been the only shoe for me to last well beyond all the others. I have always been pleased. I cannot say anything yet about the longevity yet but time will tell. The construction is perfect as always with new balance. New Balance was running a sale when I bought mine so the price was great! My only regret was not buying another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Your Name Here

customer_reviews.title: There are Very comfortable sneaks.
customer_reviews.text: I always buy New Balance shoes as they are one of the very few athletic shoes that bother to offer a choice in shoe widths. As I take a EE width, the other brands simply won't work for me. If you have a human foot, and not an olympic athlete's foot, you need to get you some of these shoes. Super comfy and they have that slightly retro look too. They are also very well built and haven't shown any signs of unusual wear. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, especially for those with wide feet
customer_reviews.text: I've bought New Balance sneakers for several years now because I need a wide option and not many athletic shoes manufacturers offer them. It is convenient now that old-man style shoes are the trend because these retro sneakers are definitely not modern or sleak. The shoes are very comfortable, they are a reliable size, and they are sturdy enough to last. The price I paid for these (which is no longer available) was much lower here than on Zappos -- where I have traditionally bought these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: J.L.M.Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Tight all around
customer_reviews.text: I typically have good luck with New Balance for my son (who has an extra wide foot) but this shoe is tight- even for a half size up. I extended the laces as much as possible and I can see the sides of his foot are cramped and the top of his foot is right up to the roof of the shoe. I wish I could return but I threw away all my packaging thinking this was just like all the other New Balance shoes. Disappointed but I will be more careful in the future
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart first use
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying I love New Balance brand shoes. But this pair fell short. The first time I went to put these shoes on the tongue in the left shoe ripped right off...it seemed to be held on with 2 or 3 stitches at most. As I have had many other pairs of this brands shoes, I know it was just this pair that has been poor,y produced but it still frustrates me.
customer_reviews.author: eeyorezbk

customer_reviews.title: Durable, not supportive enough
customer_reviews.text: I wear these to work, on my feet 40hrs a week on concrete, roughly 13-15k steps per day. I was looking for a replacement for my old pair of 311s, sadly they were discontinued. These shoes are a similar replacement, but don't provide as much comfort or support as the 311 did. My feet are really sore after a 9hr day. They seem well built and should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Cheapskate

customer_reviews.title: size 9 women's,  ordered 7.5 men's-perfect fit👌
customer_reviews.text: I wear an 8.5 typically in most athletic shoes. However in new balance i size up to women's size 9. I ordered these men's size 7.5 and they fit perfectly as my other size 9 womens do. Plus they were an excellent price. I'm stoked, I always like the mens colors better anyway. So happy with purchase. Super comfy, I love my new balance 515's 😍
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: meh, ill keep it i guess
customer_reviews.text: It's okay if you use the running loops to fix the shape. It's warm and good for the winter, although I wouldn't go for a long walk in them and certainly not good for running. Regarding fit, I wear size 11, I got a 10.5 for length to match. Regarding width, it's hard to put them on, but once it's on, it has the tightness of a size 8 in the middle and tightness of size 12 in the toes and ankles, kinda like an hour glass/snow boots. Construction is average. The N sign in the middle/inside distorts the fabric to bend inward when walking so it scrapes against your foot a little with each step.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Classic and very reliable sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I love classic sneakers, until my first new balance, I wore mostly Adidas basketball sneakers. I have a rare and non-standard foot size, so I can't find affordable summer sneakers in my country. With the new balance, this problem disappeared by itself, because here on Amazon, I can safely buy size 17 Sneakers without having to bother with many hours of searching. The quality of the material and wear resistance of these models made me very happy, I will buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Sober01ShT

customer_reviews.title: Decent shoe but not for me
customer_reviews.text: The shoe fit pretty good except that the back was a bit too short and it wasnt as deep as hoped for the insert. Have a hard time finding shoes for size 17 long toe foot. Usually cant find a wide enough toe bow so have been trying the wide width. They were so close to being what was wanted, but did return the shoes. Burgendy/hemp is not as bad as red, but I'll wear most colors if I can just find the right fit.
customer_reviews.author: LadyG

customer_reviews.title: Okay shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I tend to stick to Avia brand athletic shoes, because they just always seem to fit me right. I picked these up on a whim, when Amazon must have had a supply issue with Avia, and I couldn't find ones I wanted. So I gave these New Balance a try. They're okay. They're a bit smaller on me than Avias usually are. Not the greatest fit for me. But other than that, they're okay - nothing special, nothing horrible, just okay. Because of the fit, I won't buy these again, I'll just stick with Avia.
customer_reviews.author: MagicSkip

customer_reviews.title: Retro kicks
customer_reviews.text: I like the retro New Balance styles and these are no different. I really appreciate that NB makes almost everything in both a wide and extra wide. There's not much at all for arch support but you could put insoles in them if you really wanted. This isn't a running shoe so I don't expect it to support like one. I got a 4E pair and they are PLENTY wide for me. I've never really had a bad pair of NB. They look cool too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow
customer_reviews.text: These shoes have a nice classic design and I like their color. But they run extremely narrow, normally I wear size 7.5 wide, and with these I had to go up to 8 x wide and still I useD a shoe stretcher. And I can't say they are comfortable for long walks. I kept a pair of shoes because I really like them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Every pair of New Balance I've ever purchased has fit as expected. I can literally go into any store and pick up a 9 4E and it always fits the same way; not these. My toe is within about a quarter inch from the end and the width is closer to a 2E. Not sure what happened when these were made but it's an epic fail.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meh.. not as comfortable as the New Balance 608
customer_reviews.text: I have tried these on and am debating on returning them for another pair of 608 New Balance shoes. These 515 models look better than other New Balance styles, but the comfort is not the same. These are stiff, and the heels are elevated. I ordered the 4E wide and they aren't quite wide enough. They also feel more like an 11.8 than a size 12.
customer_reviews.author: Neal Diamond

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected but man new balance has turned into a cheaply built shoe company. My last 3 pairs have worn heels on the inside, worn bottom soles, and a general cheap build about them. Not worth 50 or even 40, these are 25dollar shoes. Mine had a wrinkle,crease in the toe that never went away...adding to cheapness of them.
customer_reviews.author: stuff

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and stable but on the tight side
customer_reviews.text: Been walking in these for a week now. Got the 11.5 4E and just don’t feel like other NB’s, it’s tight around my left toes and painful on my right arch (overall a tight feel). My feet will get numb if I’m sitting idle in these for more then 10 minutes. The shoes are supportive and very stable. The insoles are garbage. I got some upgraded inserts the next day.
customer_reviews.author: EzK

customer_reviews.title: Much smaller than other NB
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these in 9.5 4E like I do all New Balance, which is always the right size for me, however these were the exception. Width was fine and I loved the retro look but length was way smaller than normal. I would probably have needed to go up to 10.5 and would have had I not decided to just return rather than exchange.
customer_reviews.author: AMHepworth

customer_reviews.title: Returning. Still good looking. Search Hickies laces.
customer_reviews.text: Classic look. Near Eternal if not for white insides look. The width was too tight. Toe box a bit long for me. Needed 10E, amazon was out of stock. The ball of the big toe, is shielded too low. Would bump and scrap through this piece of mesh about the too small leather shoulder.
customer_reviews.author: Hi Ui Ewe iew Neil Sandage, GreatCTO, Chuck Bartowski

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and light sneakers to wear.
customer_reviews.text: These pair of sneakers fit well and are comfortable to wear while walking, running, etc. The only dislike I have is that the color of brown sugar is not exactly enhancing. I tried to just get a dark brown, but I could not find it.
customer_reviews.author: John A. Malagrin

customer_reviews.title: Maybe a little ugly, but comfy for big feet.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 14, and it seems that NB and Nike are the only sneaks that really comfortably carry me and my big feet around in comfort, and the sizes never seem to vary much. For a fewer dollars, and being over 50, I could care less about the color. They work, they don't hurt my feet, that's all I need.
customer_reviews.author: T. Pacher

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: I was big fan of New Balance because they were the only made in the USA tennis shoes, not no more, made in Indonesia. They are good shoes, just no pride. I miss the part of being proud to buy American.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna S.

customer_reviews.title: Look great but not the usual New Balance comfort
customer_reviews.text: Could be the most uncomfortable shoes I've ever worn. You WILL need insoles if you're going to stand around in these and, for the love of feet, don't go running unless you are an appreciative connoisseur of plantar fasciitis. Remember, these shoes are athLEISURE wear. That being said, the blue ones look great and could be my most-complimented pair of shoes in well over a decade. Also, had to return the first pair for being too small. If you're ever unsure of whether shoes you buy online will fit, then definitely go the next size up with these
customer_reviews.author: Robert Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think I’ve had a more comfortable shoe so light weight
customer_reviews.author: stefan mccarthy

customer_reviews.title: Not wide at all
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers have stated these aren't wide in the toe area, very slim shoe and I even bought a size up. There's also a bump I felt like I was standing on inside the shoe. These companies are pumping these shoes out too fast and the quality suffers. Not Amazon's fault I'll just find something else.
customer_reviews.author: pattk77

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Again another comfortable shoe by New balance, size 13 fit perfect. I'm very stylish shoe. Lightweight. I've only had one pair of New balance shoes that actually were absolutely horrible I returned them. But all other 15 pairs including this one are dynamite.
customer_reviews.author: B.m

customer_reviews.title: Not for a wide foot!!
customer_reviews.text: Way too small and not the wide width I had assumed I purchased when I chose the wide width. Disappointed bc I couldn’t return them as I wanted and needed to, but that’s bc of reasons that are not the fault of anyone else. Just disappointed to know shopping for shoes are now just as difficult as clothes bc in reality we don’t really know what it is we are actually going to receive, regardless of what we asked for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are a great comfortable shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I have worn New Balance 515 for the last 10 years! They make great skating shoes after you wear them out as everyday shoes. I am on my feet all day long and they are a great quality shoe that supports my foot well.
customer_reviews.author: A. Cena

customer_reviews.title: My go to sneaker!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these sneakers for myself for work and leisure. I love NB and hoped that I would not be disappointed after reading the many reviews. I love the way they feel on my feet: snug but not too snug. I’ve worn them working 12 hour shifts and walking the strip in Vegas. My feet never tired from being on them.
customer_reviews.author: tia greene

customer_reviews.title: Size is way wrong.
customer_reviews.text: It's absolutely ridiculous that sizing can be this far off from the same company. Returning as unwearable. Pic shows old NB size 13M(right) next to the new NB size 13M that smashes toes(left).
customer_reviews.author: Matt Faber

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in size inconsistency.
customer_reviews.text: I normally love New Balance shoes, but it took me a while to realize that the left shoe is visibly smaller than the right. My left foot is already larger than my right, so this doesn’t work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Brendon O'Donnell

customer_reviews.title: Shoes fit and had room to breathe!
customer_reviews.text: Shipped fast and product was accurate; however, the insoles were not actually attached to the inside of the shoe, which I found odd. Other than that one compliant I would definitely buy another pair from this seller in other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Tina B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but not quite as pictured on Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes themselves are awesome! Only one issue... pictured as all black with gum sole... the shoes I received had a bright brass colored grommet on the top lace holes that stood out like a sore thumb. Double checked the images and there are NO grommets in the pics. Of course, as of the day I received them, Amazon shows them out of stock, so no way to exchange them. Oh well. Ended up painting the grommets black...
customer_reviews.author: db

customer_reviews.title: Narrow Balance .....
customer_reviews.text: New Balance used to be great for wide feet but they’ve gotten more and more narrow. The 4e fit like a 2e and the arch support is about an inch farther back than my arch. With that said, they look great and after a month they’re comfortable enough for wearing to work but not for a day of walking around.
customer_reviews.author: thebarzeen

customer_reviews.title: Runs narrow
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son. He loves them. These are nice looking shoes. He does a lot of walking and has no complaints. They do run narrow but he has narrow feet. He would definitely buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: deezee

customer_reviews.title: Great, comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Size is good. Toe area is wide which is what I wanted. I wear a 101/2 W shoe and ordered a 12 W shoe from New Balance. Fits perfectly for me. Lots of toe room. Shoe has a great deal of cushioning but still has the necessary form to hold my foot in place for jogging comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: RAM

customer_reviews.title: great for my 12 year old with super wide feet
customer_reviews.text: we were able to snag these for only about $30 which was a great deal. my poor kid with super wide feet never is able to buy the super-fashionable shoes, and these are so much closer to fashionable for him than the other options out there for wide shoes. it's really hard to get shoes wide enough, but these are great.
customer_reviews.author: nyx1969

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I had to return the first pair I bought because there was a lump in the bottom of the show that hurt my foot. I ordered a replacement pair which I am very happy with. Love the color and they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Not the Old Balance of the past.
customer_reviews.text: Great sneakers and super cool. They drive the ladies wild. Nothing says im not an ex-con like New Balance.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Miller

customer_reviews.title: Invest in some Dr. Scholls inserts
customer_reviews.text: There a little big and feel a little loose. The cushioning is non-existenting. Iv has them for less then a month, I only wear them twice a week on my days off and I can already feel the ground under my feet.
customer_reviews.author: DWIGHT H.

customer_reviews.title: Be Careful, it runs at least 1 size smaller.
customer_reviews.text: Great price for good pair of shoes. However, these run at least a size and a half smaller. I can't go higher as the front will extend too far out. Will be returning. Warning: Runs SMALL
customer_reviews.author: The0ne

customer_reviews.title: Shoddy Defective Import
customer_reviews.text: My pair came obviously defective -- the tongue padding was lumpy, lace holes were punched in wrong places so they did not allign properly, and the leather portion of the upper attached at a strange angle. It's amazing that the factory let this product out the door. Indonesia.
customer_reviews.author: V. O. Max

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My husband has a bad back and needed some good arch support. These fit him perfectly. Width is good for him and they provide the support he needs. At this price you can’t beat these sneakers. And they look good too!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Easy to walk
customer_reviews.text: Its easy to walk all day with this piece. My dad wears it all day 🎉🥳
customer_reviews.author: GM

customer_reviews.title: Great style. Great fit. Awesome price
customer_reviews.text: Love them. I have several pairs of shoes, most name brands and the New Balance have become my favorites. Shipping was fast, arrived sooner than expected or so it seemed. Shoes were brand new and in perfect condition. Lightweight, comfortable, well made, all the things we look for in a quality performance shoe without sacrificing an arm and a toe in the purchase of a pair. Definitely a 5 star product from a 5 star seller.
customer_reviews.author: Warren Bush

customer_reviews.title: Love New Balance
customer_reviews.text: Love New Balance! They always fit as I expect them to. The fit with new balance depends on if there is mesh used on the top toe area or not. If not I always have to get a 1/2 size bigger. I usually buy men’s size 7 1/2 as opposed to women’s 9. They always fit better and are the slightest bit wider than women’s sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki B.

customer_reviews.title: Truly love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: These responses are from my grandson to whom the shoes were given as a birthday present. Truly love these shoes, comfortable, and I love them. I haven't been able to afford these for quite a while , but my Grandfather, Don Sink, got them for me. Outstanding shoes, I work on my feet for long hours at a time and these New Balance ML515's are exactly what I needed . Superior workmanship and very attractive color combinations. If you are looking for a first class pair of shoes, here they are .
customer_reviews.author: Don Sink

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe for Wide Feet
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, nice and wide, 4E, perfect fit. Comfortable, looks good (not garish in the green). Been wearing New Balance for years so it child be durable.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Beyer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for My Husband's Giant Feet
customer_reviews.text: My husband has huge size 15 feet. Shoes rarely fit him correctly. New Balances seem to work the best and they are comfortable on him and perfectly snug so he gets the ankle support!
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: These are great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted these retro-looking shoes but usually, they are too narrow. New Balance comes through again. I love the style and fit.
customer_reviews.author: bookster

customer_reviews.title: Husband loved it
customer_reviews.text: Got half a size bigger, and fit perfect. My husband has wide feet and many so called “wide” size sneakers are still too narrow. These were perfect. He loves the color, and how light they are on his feet. (He’s used to work boots)
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my 11 year old son. He normally wears a pair of shoe to pieces before he can outgrow them. Not the case with these. They are still in great shape 5 months into wearing them. I would buy these again!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Shields

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Dad Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Need to do a bit of walking? Chase after a toddler? Be able to slip them on or tighten them up for a short run? These fit the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. M

customer_reviews.title: Such a disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I have had many pairs of New Balance shoes for years and these are the first that did not fit well at all. The shoes had my toes digging into the front. I even went up an extra size thinking maybe that would fix the problem. I was super disappointed in this shoe, especially since I really like the design and colors that it came in.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Ninja quiet
customer_reviews.text: I love them, I think that they look really cool while wearing them. These shoes don't bunch up your pant bottoms, so they sit over then nicely. The bottom stripe is light grey as I expected. They are on the tight side on width, but still fit. You should definitely buy toward the lager size. It is a funny thing that I noticed is how quiet they are to walk in.
customer_reviews.author: Wineguy

customer_reviews.title: best 30 dollars ever spent
customer_reviews.text: extremely cheap and very much worth the price. i just got them today so hopefully they last a while. if they dont, i'll update this review.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Review update - Worst Shoes I've ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: Updated Review: I've given these shoes several chances to break-in, but they never have. They are way narrow and hurt my feet every time I wear them. I love New Balance, but the sizing is way off on this one. Original Review: I have wide feet, and these are too narrow. Bought another pair of New Balances at the same time and fit perfectly. Wish I went a size up.
customer_reviews.author: T. Skaggs

customer_reviews.title: Fast service
customer_reviews.text: A little to small had to return them but the shoes looked nice received them on time and when I return them got my money back earlier then expected
customer_reviews.author: Joany BossQueen​

customer_reviews.title: They are comfortable and look nice
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were purchased for my husband. He is wearing them. He has not suggested returning them. This is a definite positive. They are comfortable and look nice. Nice change from the all black and all white ones. He does like New Balance.
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: ... purchased nothing but New Balance since Nike got the bad rap for sweat shop labor 15 years ago
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased nothing but New Balance since Nike got the bad rap for sweat shop labor 15 years ago. I can always trust that a size 10 is exactly what is states. These how ever are one size smaller. I believe they are either a fake or mislabeled. I hate them and after taking them on a plane ride for 27 hours. I would rather die than ever think about buying these again.......Money well wasted !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keep the return box if they got to give you a bad shoe
customer_reviews.text: Well I really like new balance shoes this pair was a dud the arch was in the wrong spot there was a lump underneath the ball of my foot I should have returned them but I never got around to it got a set of inserts and they still make my feet hurt
customer_reviews.author: kathy p

customer_reviews.title: Looks like I am wearing a low-top Timberland boot.
customer_reviews.text: When I put these on it looks like I am wearing a low-top Timberland boot and people have commented this as well. I didn't realize it just from this picture that's how they would look, but maybe I should have. I like them, just don't love them. Still a quality sneaker from NB and especially if you like that kind of look then go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Brown

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Awsome sneaker. I haven't worn them till now after all these years. I'm surprised they still made them. Very very comfortable and very supportive.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent S.

customer_reviews.title: Not New Balance Quality at all.
customer_reviews.text: Shows are much smaller then expected in fit from bottom of foot to top side of foot near the toe area. I have wore nothing but New Balance for years, and always have had great shoes. However this is the first pair that I have ordered online of this number. I am regretting it now. The price drew me in, but I am assuming that is why they are of such poor quality. Also they came in a generic box, not a New Balance shoe box.
customer_reviews.author: Onagain

customer_reviews.title: I love New Balance shoes because of their consistently wide width ...
customer_reviews.text: I love New Balance shoes because of their consistently wide width offerings (I’m a 2E-4E width). I’ve probably bought 20+ pairs in my life and they’ve always fit after minimal breaking in. This pair is giving me a little more trouble than normal, though, possibly in part because it’s a different model (I usually go with the 574s). Everything else about them is great - the support, the lace-up pattern, the color - so I’m hoping a little more break-in will happen the more I wear them. I walk dogs for a living so I put 40-50 miles a week on my shoes for work.
customer_reviews.author: Alex D.

customer_reviews.title: Hair Big But No problem
customer_reviews.text: I love these sneakers. I'm a 14 wide. They're a hair big, but I know a 13 wide would be to small. True confession I own 6 pair. Every color for every situation. When you find a shoe in my size at an affordable price you buy them.
customer_reviews.author: Carhauler

customer_reviews.title: New Balance gives me great support and last longer than the cheaper shoes.
customer_reviews.text: New Balance gives me great support and last longer than the cheaper shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Very poor fit
customer_reviews.text: Three pairs of 515s in the same size, every one of them fit differently. Shoe was well made but just a horrible fit. New Balance 4E is narrower than 2E in several other brands.
customer_reviews.author: J. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Nice color
customer_reviews.text: Very good looking shoes. Bought it for my husband. We had to return it, because it was too wide.other than that they are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Tomsmom

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes! (Order 1 size up)
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were just what I was looking for. I wanted something that I could wear to work or to school, do everything in, and be comfortable. I usually wear a size 14, but after reading the reviews I ordered a 15 and they fit like a dream. Broken in right out of the box, I can't take them out, they are so comfortable. I would say that my foot is normal width and these fit perfectly, not too narrow, not too wide. So comfortable. ORDER A SIZE UP.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I should not have ordered the “Wide” version of this shoe. It still fits really well, though, so I will chalk it up to a lesson learned... Otherwise, I love these shoes. They are the correct length and are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: AlexDIowaGuy

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and look great
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great! I purchased them as a gift for my significant other...he loved them so much he immediately purchased 2 more pairs in other colors. He does wear orthotics, not sure if that makes a difference in anyone else's comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: The shoes were pretty nice; however
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were pretty nice; however, I do recommend only wearing these on certain days. These shoes should not meet water as the material is a little different than other shoes I am used to and the material becomes scruffy after meeting water. But overall, very comfortable shoes and seems durable as well as attractive.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: I got one defective shoe and one regular one
customer_reviews.text: Love the style, super disappointed that one shoe fell apart in less than three months. It looks like they didn't glue down the tread at all. Kind of annoyed, I'm not hard on shoes and my previous new balance shoes lasted over a year before I wore away a spot on the tread. Seems like I'm owed an exchange, this one shoe is defective.
customer_reviews.author: Airbnb Manager

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable durable reasonable priced
customer_reviews.text: If you have wide feet New Balance are for you. So far holding up well. I will probably order the same model again maybe a different color next time. Primarily use as everyday sneaker with some light exercise here and there.
customer_reviews.author: getwhatu$4

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: I'm disappointed because the shoes arrived dirty looking. Scuff Mark's and dirt residue. And they're a gift for my dad so I'm pretty sad they would send these to me.
customer_reviews.author: K. williams

customer_reviews.title: WAY TOO SMALL - DON'T BUY
customer_reviews.text: The shoe I bought says size 14 inside it but it is very small. I have been wearing new balance size 14 for years and they typically fit well with some room to spare. This pair caused my toes to curl up. I don't know if it is a defect on this shoe, on the one pair I got, or some other factor. I wore them when I got them and thought it was just because they were new. They got a little dirty so I couldn't return them. I gave them away to my brother who wears a 13. Hopefully they fit him well.
customer_reviews.author: charles costello

customer_reviews.title: Classic NB shoe just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Great, same old reliable quality. It's not a slip resistant shoe in case you were shopping for one. It's just a normal comfortable walking shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Sporty and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a size 8.5/9 in women's tennis shoes/boots. The men's 7.5 fits great! I got them in navy and really like how sporty and comfortable they are!
customer_reviews.author: MetJet

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, with removable insert
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy shoe, fits snugly, which is good, doesn't have a high heel, and the insole insert is removable. It's important to me to not have some glued in, huge thing in there, because I need to use my own custom orthotic inserts in my shoes.
customer_reviews.author: D. Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Comfort is best
customer_reviews.text: 2nd pair of New Balances and have issues with my arch but this pair seem to be on point and have zero complaints. I’m leaving my Nikes and buying New Balances from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sneakers, only D size run a bit narrow
customer_reviews.text: Models in size D run a bit narrow than usual. If you have wide feet or high arch go for W (wide) size. Other wise good quality sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable footwear
customer_reviews.text: Dont get me wrong. The shoes are worth 5 stars. But the soles were in no way adhered to the shoe thus my 3 star rating. The first time i wore them the sole came out with my foot.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: biohazard
customer_reviews.text: product showed up at my door with blood from someone all over outside of package.
customer_reviews.author: vic

customer_reviews.title: Man-made uppers feel scratchy & no arch support
customer_reviews.text: I don't always wear socks, but that's not an option with these shoes, because the man-made uppers scratch. Also there is zero arch support- none at all.
customer_reviews.author: Valueminded

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: My husband lives in these shoes. They are very comfortable and come in various styles. Have to buy him new ones because he wears out the insoles.
customer_reviews.author: Marianna

customer_reviews.title: Runs small, but very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe but I had to order a whole size up. I typically wear a 9.5 wide, so this needed to be a 10.5. No break in time at all. Walked 7 miles a day in them for the first week and they were refreshing to put back on the next day. If I could give 6 stars I would. Especially for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

product_meta.title: New Balance Men's 515v1 Sneaker
product_meta.description: The 515 sneaker offers a modern classic silhouette you can wear everyday in a casual workplace, hanging out, or on the streets. The ultra-soft EVA foam midsole helps keep you comfortable, while the solid rubber outsole is designed to deliver superior support no matter where you wander.
